DataElement.preferredName: FIQOL 11 Due to Accidental Bowel Leakage Feel I Have No Control Over My Bowels Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation about their level of agreement that they feel they have no control over their bowels due to accidental bowel leakage, using a 4 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Fecal Incontinence Quality of Life Scale Due to Accidental Bowel Leakage Feel I Have No Control Over My Bowels Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 29-question quality of life scale developed to address issues related specifically to fecal incontinence._A question about how often or how strongly an individual agrees that they had certain feelings, thoughts, or experiences due to an accidental bowel leakage._A question about how often an individual feels they have no control over their bowels._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ReferenceDocuments.description: I feel I have no control over my bowels.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
